author: AntumDeluge
long_description:
### Usage:

Right-click the equipment examiner node & place an item into its inventory slot to populate the specs list.

Crafting: see [README](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-equip_exam#crafting)

### Mod Support:

- [![3d_armor](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=ContentDB&message=3d_armor&color=%23375a7f&logo=minetest)](https://content.minetest.net/packages/stu/3d_armor/) *(defense specs)*
- [![slingshot](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=ContentDB&message=slingshot&color=%23375a7f&logo=minetest)](https://content.minetest.net/packages/AntumDeluge/slingshot/) *(range value)*
- [![unifieddyes](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=ContentDB&message=unifieddyes&color=%23375a7f&logo=minetest)](https://content.minetest.net/packages/VanessaE/unifieddyes/) *(node coloring)*
- [![wielded_light](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=ContentDB&message=wielded_light&color=%23375a7f&logo=minetest)](https://content.minetest.net/packages/bell07/wielded_light/) *(light value)*
- [![workbench](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=GitHub&message=workbench&color=%23375a7f&logo=github)](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-workbench) *(repairable status)*
- [![xdecor](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=ContentDB&message=xdecor&color=%23375a7f&logo=minetest)](https://content.minetest.net/packages/jp/xdecor/) *(repairable status) (dependent on [PR 147](https://github.com/minetest-mods/xdecor/pull/147))*
- [![3d_armor_light](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=ContentDB&message=3d_armor_light&color=%23375a7f&logo=minetest)](https://content.minetest.net/packages/AntumDeluge/3d_armor_light/)

### Links:

- [Changelog](https://github.com/AntumMT/mod-equip_exam/blob/master/changelog.txt)

name: equip_exam
short_description: A node that will examine the specs of equipment.
title: Equipment Examiner
